title: How I Grow Tomatoes Indoors
description: Growing tomatoes indoors requires adequate sunlight, deep pots, and regular pruning. Here's how I manage it in a small apartment.

title: Caring for Succulents in Monsoon
description: Succulents are sensitive to overwatering during monsoon. I use a DIY drainage tray to prevent root rot.

description: Compost tea can significantly boost plant health. Learn how to brew and apply it effectively.
